info.name: Tamo.lt Customizable Theme
info.description:
A customizable theme for sistema.tamo.lt/tamo.15min.lt/dienynas.tamo.lt. Also disables the sponsored advertisements currently visible on tamo.lt.

Tamo (Tavo Mokykla) is a lithuanian website for schools to sync their student data online, show homework, grades, etc.
info.additionalInfo: You can customize the colors by clicking on the Advanced Style settings just above this text. Feedback and bug reports are welcome! 2017.04.28 - Added support for dienynas.tamo.lt. Increased size of cross in mobile version in the ad. Fixed colors in the birthday tab. Some other minor color fixes. 2016.12.11 - Fixed the color of the 5 min warning pop-up. Theme now works for tamo.15min.lt as well. 2016.11.23 - Fixed some colors in the 'Dienynas' tab. 2016.10.03 - Added customizable colors, several login screen pictures, black or white icons. Updated the color of a dialog box in the 'Dienynas' tab. 2016.09.29 - Made the 'new messages' icon and the text in the polls (apklausos) section easier to read. 2016.09.26 - Added support for the tamo.lt homepage. Not sure what to do about tamo.15min.lt. 2016.09.23 - Release
